pkgmetadata.longdescription: Integrative Differential Network Analysis in Genomics // Fits covariate dependent partial correlation matrices for integrative models to identify differential networks between two groups. The methods are described in Class et. al., (2018) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btx750 and Ha et. al., (2015) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btv406.
